se.vingmedia.xss.server
Interface ClientEventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
Server
public interface ClientEventListener

The ClientEventListener interface is used for classes that wants to be informed of added and removed clients in a ClientProxy.

The combination of this interface and the ConnectionEventReceiver interface is rather confusing. They should be joined or named better.

Until further documented, this interface should not be used by module developers.

Method Summary
 void clientStart(ClientConnection client)
          Informs the listener that the client with the ClientConnection object client has been accepted by the server.
 void clientStop(ClientConnection c)
          Inform the listener that the client associated with the ClientConnection client has been removed from the ClientProxy, for any reason.

clientStop

public void clientStop(ClientConnection c)
Inform the listener that the client associated with the ClientConnection client has been removed from the ClientProxy, for any reason.
